Package org.apache.xpath.functions.string

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FuncAnalyzeString
    Implementation of the fn:analyze-string function.
    FuncCodepointEqual
    Implementation of the codepoint-equal() function.
    FuncCodePointsToString
    Implementation of the codepoints-to-string() function.
    FuncCompare
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 function fn:compare.
    FuncConcat
    Execute the concat() function.
    FuncContains
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 function fn:contains.
    FuncContainsToken
    Implementation of an XPath 3.1 function contains-token().
    FuncEndsWith
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 function fn:ends-with.
    FuncLowerCase
    Implementation of the lower-case() function.
    FuncMatches
    Implementation of the fn:matches function.
    FuncNormalizeSpace
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 fn:normalize-space function.
    FuncReplace
    Implementation of the fn:replace function.
    FuncStartsWith
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 function fn:starts-with.
    FuncStringJoin
    Implementation of an XPath 3.1 string-join function.
    FuncStringLength
    Implementation of string-length() function.
    FuncStringToCodepoints
    Implementation of the string-to-codepoints() function.
    FuncSubstring
    Implementation of substring() function.
    FuncSubstringAfter
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 function fn:substring-after.
    FuncSubstringBefore
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 function fn:substring-before.
    FuncTokenize
    Implementation of the fn:tokenize function.
    FuncTranslate
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 fn:translate() function.
    FuncUpperCase
    Implementation of the upper-case() function.
    XSL3StringCollationAwareFunction
    A class definition, specifying implementation to support XPath 3.1 string collation aware functions.
